ToolboxOptions.Summary: Unofficial Dropbox File API V2 SDK for MATLAB
ToolboxOptions.Description: Class-based Dropbox File API-Client for uploading and downloading files from Dropbox. Users can log in via the browser, so credentials are not stored in MATLAB. The client has the following functions:  - uploadFile (Files up to 350GB, with progress monitor)  - downloadFile (With progress monitor)  - listFolder  - createFolder  - getMetadata  - search  - move  - copy  - getTemporaryDownloadLink  - getTemporaryUploadLink
